__e: Because what we do is all sweetness and light, right? At least we have a nicer view.
May I say that never before in my life have I seen such sweetness and rare...
And not a day has passed that I haven't longed to feel the sweet touch of living flesh again.
And I guess in a moment as that You forget about your hat
And I guess in a moment as that You forget about your hat
Her beauty, her gentleness, her grace...
You know, it's like candy, Having sex with you.
So I thought I grab a little sugar with my baby.
The sweetness was still there after washing., As we had a late breakfast...,
Well, I think this is home, sweet home.
*And it's warm and real and bright And the world has somehow shifted*
You, who are not a man and have never known the sweetness of a woman's kiss.
